content: white and the tail black trans pride whale round 1 - 5 light blue round 6 - 10 pink round 11 - 17 white round 18 - 22 pink round 23 - 28 light blue the fins should be white and the tail light blue please do not distribute sell print otherwise give away or claim as yours any part of this pattern pictures included you may sell finished products using this pattern however i ask that you credit ambroscrochet 5
